comments:
description:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException throw out when click on finish without choose column

steps to reproduce:
1. create a xml data source
2. create a xml data set
3. in column mapping page, don't choose any object as it's column
4. click on finish button

actual result:
ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException throw out 

exception stack trace:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.xml.util.RelationInformation.initialize(RelationInformation.java:70)

When there is no column chosen, the warning will be shown to warn user select the column.
